text: William Godwin (8 August 1912 - 3 February 2000) was a British sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, prone event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:2000 deaths Category:British male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Great Britain Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham, West Midlands
title: William Godwin (sport shooter)
